word:
"BROTHER WHITE: YOUR KIND COMMUNICATION REACHED ME BY THIS WEEK'S MAIL. AS THE MAIL COMES HERE ONLY ONCE A WEEK, AND IS TO LEAVE TOMORROW, I HASTEN TO REPLY. WE ARE HERE IN THE 
                                                                           667
BUSH, AS IT WERE, AND AN INDIAN CARRIES THE MAIL FRIDAYS ON FOOT, AND RETURNS TUESDAYS. I HAVE CONSULTED BROTHER THOMPSON AS TO THE ROUTE, AND HE SAYS MY BEST AND SUREST WAY WILL BE TO TAKE A BOAT FROM HERE AND GO TO MILWAUKEE, AND THENCE TO GRAND HAVEN.
